attributes.action: A one off tax of £52. To fund a tax free bonus for frontline NHS staff.
attributes.additional_details: In these troubled times we need to do more for the NHS frontline staff than clap and paint rainbows. Show them how much we appreciate them.
attributes.background: A £52 tax to be paid by all tax payers, equivalent to a pound a week. This is then divided equally between all NHS frontline staff, doctors nurses cleaners etc, and paid as a tax free bonus.
